title: Andrew McCabe’s Lawyer Again Asks Prosecutors to Drop Case
text:
Andrew McCabe hasn’t been indicted for allegedly lying to federal investigators, according to an email from his attorney to prosecutors, in a sign that the government’s case against the Federal Bureau of Investigation’s former No. 2 official may be in jeopardy.

The email is the latest development in days of uncertainty about whether Mr. McCabe, who drew repeated criticism from President Trump during the U.S. criminal probe into Russian election interference, would face criminal charges for alleged false statements he made...
description: Andrew McCabe hasn’t been indicted for allegedly lying to federal investigators, according to an email from his attorney, in a sign that the case against the FBI’s former No. 2 official may be in jeopardy.
